name: GrUP
description:
You are stranded as Grub, a small alien which just hatched. After you crashed with your mothership you find yourself in a sciencelab full of guards.
To get out you need to eat enough food, fix the mothership and head to the exit-door.
Luckily you can craft and fuse items together by collecting them in the right order and bringing it to the mothership to repair it. But Grub has to be careful or else the scientists will slice him up.
Will you and your mothership survive the crash?
